name: Topyas's Support
description: Draw 2 cards. Both sides gain the following effect: "After you play a card this Round, randomly Discard 1 card or draw 1 card."
descriptionraw: Draw 2 cards. Both sides gain the following effect: "After you play a card this Round, randomly $[K56] 1 card or draw 1 card."
descriptionreplaced: Draw 2 cards. Both sides gain the following effect: "After you play a card this Round, randomly <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color> 1 card or draw 1 card."
